title: I keep getting this message every day
body: I keep this error message every time I login or look at something its really annoying. Most of the time it appears 5 times when I login, clicking it would result for it to duplicate.

replies.body: Have you updated to the test client but using the legacy?  Are you using any third party programs that interact with league?  Some examples include play.tv and overlays, but they've been known to cause some client issues and even crashes.  Removing them should fix it up.  I hope that helps!
